Verses: 1 mariyaalum Aval Sagodhariyaagiya Maarththaalum Irundha Peththaaniyaa Graamaththilullavanaagiya Laasaru Ennum Oruvan Vyaadhippattirundhaan.
2 karththarukkup Parimalathailam Poosi, Than Thalaimayiraal Avarudaiya Paadhangalaith Thudaiththaval Andha Mariyaale; Avaludaiya Sagodharanaagiya Laasaru Vyaadhiyaayirundhaan.
3 appozhudhu Avanudaiya Sagodharigal; Aandavare, Neer Snegikkiravan Vyaadhiyaayirukkiraan Endru Solla, Avaridaththirku Aal Anuppinaargal.
4 yesu Adhaik Kettapozhudhu: Indha Vyaadhi Maranaththukku Edhuvaayiraamal Dhevanudaiya Magimai Vilanguvadharku Edhuvaayirukkiradhu; Dhevanudaiya Kumaaranum Adhinaal Magimaippaduvaar Endraar.
5 yesu Maarththaalidaththilum Avaludaiya Sagodhariyinidaththilum Laasaruvinidaththilum Anbaayirundhaar.
6 avan Vyaadhiyaayirukkiradhaaga Avar Kelvippattapozhudhu, Thaam Irundha Idaththile Pinnum Irandunaal Thanginaar.
7 adhanpinbu Avar Thammudaiya Seesharai Nokki: Naam Marupadiyum Yoodheyaavukkup Povom Vaarungal Endraar.
8 adharku Seeshargal; Rabee, Ippozhudhudhaan Yoodhar Ummaik Kalleriyath Thedinaargale, Marupadiyum Neer Avvidaththirkup Pogalaamaa Endraargal.
9 yesu Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Pagalukkup Pannirandu Manineram Illaiyaa? Oruvan Pagalile Nadandhaal Avan Indha Ulagaththin Velichchaththaik Kaangirapadiyinaal Idaramaattaan.
10 oruvan Iravile Nadandhaal Thannidaththil Velichcham Illaadhapadiyinaal Idaruvaan Endraar.
11 ivaigalai Avar Solliyapinbu Avargalai Nokki: Nammudaiya Snegidhanaagiya Laasaru Niththiraiyadaindhirukkiraan, Naan Avanai Ezhuppappogiren Endraar.
12 adharku Avarudaiya Seeshargal: Aandavare, Niththiraiyadaindhirundhaal Sugamadaivaan Endraargal.
13 yesuvaanavar Avanudaiya Maranaththaik Kuriththu Appadi Sonnaar; Avargalo Niththirai Seydhu Ilaippaarugiradhaik Kuriththu Sonnaarendru Ninaiththaargal.
14 appozhudhu Yesu Avargalai Nokki: Laasaru Mariththupponaan Endru Velippadaiyaai Solli;
15 naan Ange Iraadhadhinaal Neengal Visuvaasamullavargalaagiradharku Edhuvundendru Ungal Nimiththam Sandhoshappadugiren; Ippozhudhu Avanidaththirkup Povom Vaarungal Endraar.
16 appozhudhu Thidhimu Ennappatta Thomaa Matra Seeshargalai Nokki: Avarodekooda Marikkumpadi Naamum Povom Vaarungal Endraan.
17 yesu Vandhapodhu Avan Kallaraiyil Vaikkappattu Naalunaalaayitrendru Kandaar.
18 peththaaniyaa Oor Erusalemukku Sameebamaai Erakkuraiya Irandu Mail Dhooraththilirundhadhu.
19 yoodharil Anegar Maarththaal Mariyaal Enbavargaludaiya Sagodharanaik Kuriththu Avargalukku Aarudhal Sollumpadi Avargalidaththil Vandhirundhaargal.
20 yesu Varugiraar Endru Maarththaal Kelvippattapodhu, Avarukku Edhirkonduponaal; Mariyaalo Veettile Utkaarndhirundhaal.
21 maarththaal Yesuvinidaththil Vandhu: Aandavare, Neer Ingeyirundheeraanaal En Sagodharan Marikkamaattaan.
22 ippozhudhum Neer Dhevanidaththil Kettukkolluvadhedhuvo Adhai Dhevan Umakkuth Thandharuluvaar Endru Arindhirukkiren Endraal.
23 yesu Avalai Nokki: Un Sagodharan Uyirththezhundhiruppaan Endraar.
24 adharku Maarththaal: Uyirththezhudhal Nadakkum Kadaisinaalile Avanum Uyirththezhundhiruppaan Endru Arindhirukkiren Endraal.
25 yesu Avalai Nokki: Naane Uyirththezhudhalum Jeevanumaayirukkiren, Ennai Visuvaasikkiravan Mariththaalum Pizhaippaan;
26 uyirodirundhu Ennai Visuvaasikkiravanevanum Endrendraikkum Mariyaamalum Iruppaan; Idhai Visuvaasikkiraayaa Endraar.
27 adharku Aval: Aam, Aandavare, Neer Ulagaththil Varugiravaraana Dhevakumaaranaagiya Kristhu Endru Naan Visuvaasikkiren Endraal.
28 ivaigalai Sonnapinbu, Avalpoi, Than Sagodhariyaagiya Mariyaalai Ragasiyamaai Azhaiththu: Podhagar Vandhirukkiraar, Unnai Azhaikkiraar Endraal.
29 aval Adhaik Kettavudane, Seekkiramaai Ezhundhu, Avaridaththil Vandhaal.
30 yesu Innum Graamaththukkul Varaamal, Maarththaal Thammai Sandhiththa Idaththile Irundhaar.

31 appozhudhu, Veettile Avaludanekooda Irundhu Avalukku Aarudhal Sollikkondirundha Yoodhargal, Mariyaal Seekkiramaai Ezhundhupogiradhaik Kandu: Aval, Kallaraiyinidaththil Azhugiradharkup Pogiraal Endru Solli, Avalukkup Pinne Ponaargal.
32 yesu Irundha Idaththil Mariyaal Vandhu, Avaraik Kandavudane, Avar Paadhaththil Vizhundhu: Aandavare, Neer Inge Irundheeraanaal En Sagodharan Marikkamaattaan Endraal.
33 aval Azhugiradhaiyum Avalodekooda Vandha Yoodhargal Azhugiradhaiyum Yesu Kandapodhu Aaviyile Kalangith Thuyaramadaindhu:
34 avanai Enge Vaiththeergal Endraar. Aandavare, Vandhu Paarum Endraargal;
35 yesu Kanneer Vittaar.
36 appozhudhu Yoodhargal: Idho, Ivar Avanai Evvalavaai Snegiththaar Endraargal!
37 avargalil Silar Kurudanudaiya Kangalaith Thirandha Ivar, Ivanai Saagaamalirukkappannavum Koodaadhaa Endraargal.
38 appozhudhu Yesu Marupadiyum Thamakkulle Kalangik Kallaraiyinidaththirku Vandhaar. Adhu Oru Kugaiyaayirundhadhu; Adhinmel Oru Kal Vaikkappattirundhadhu.
39 yesu: Kallai Eduththuppodungal Endraar. Mariththavanudaiya Sagodhariyaagiya Maarththaal Avarai Nokki: Aandavare, Ippozhudhu Naarume, Naalunaalaayitre Endraal.
40 yesu Avalai Nokki: Nee Visuvaasiththaal Dhevanudaiya Magimaiyaik Kaanbaai Endru Naan Unakku Sollavillaiyaa Endraar.
41 appozhudhu Mariththavan Vaikkappatta Idaththilirundha Kallai Eduththuppottaargal. Yesu Thammudaiya Kangalai Ereduththu: Pidhaave, Neer Enakku Sevikoduththapadiyinaal Ummai Sthoththirikkiren.
42 neer Eppozhudhum Enakku Sevikodukkireer Endru Naan Arindhirukkiren; Aanaalum Neer Ennai Anuppinadhai Soozhndhunirkum Janangal Visuvaasikkumpadiyaaga Avargal Nimiththam Idhai Sonnen Endraar.
43 ivaigalai Sonnapinbu: Laasaruve, Veliye Vaa Endru, Uraththa Saththamaaik Kooppittaar.

44 appozhudhu, Mariththavan Veliye Vandhaan. Avan Kaalgalum Kaigalum Predha Seelaigalinaal Kattappattirundhadhu, Avan Mugamum Seelaiyaal Sutrappattirundhadhu. Yesu Avargalai Nokki: Ivanaik Kattavizhththuvidungal Endraar.
45 appozhudhu Mariyaalidaththil Vandhirundhu, Yesu Seydhavaigalaik Kandavargalaagiya Yoodhargalil Anegar Avaridaththil Visuvaasamullavargalaanaargal.
46 avargalil Silar Pariseyaridaththil Poi, Yesu Seydhavaigalai Avargalukku Ariviththaargal.
47 appozhudhu Pradhaana Aasaariyarum Pariseyarum Aalosanai Sangaththaik Kootivarachcheydhu: Naam Enna Seygiradhu? Indha Manushan Anega Arpudhangalai Seygiraane.
48 naam Ivanai Ippadi Vittuvittaal, Ellaarum Ivanai Visuvaasippaargal; Appozhudhu Romar Vandhu Nammudaiya Sthaanaththaiyum Janaththaiyum Azhiththuppoduvaargale Endraargal.
49 appozhudhu Avargalil Oruvanum Andha Varushaththup Pradhaana Aasaariyanumaagiya Kaaipaa Enbavan Avargalai Nokki: Ungalukku Ondrun Theriyaadhu;
50 janangalellaarum Kettuppogaadhapadikku Ore Manushan Janangalukkaaga Marippadhu Namakku Nalamaayirukkumendru Neengal Sindhiyaamalirukkireergal Endraan.
51 idhai Avan Suyamaai Sollaamal, Andha Varushaththup Pradhaana Aasaariyanaanapadiyinaale Yesu Yoodhajanangalukkaaga Marikkappogiraarendrum,
52 andha Janangalukkaagamaaththiramalla, Sidhariyirukkira Dhevanudaiya Pillaigalai Ondraaga Serkkiradharkaagavum Marikkappogiraarendrum, Theerkkadharisanamaai Sonnaan.
53 annaal Mudhal Avaraik Kolai Seyyumpadikku Aalosanaipanninaargal.

54 aagaiyaal Yesu Adhanpinbu Veliyarangamaai Yoodharukkulle Sanjariyaamal, Avvidamvittu Vanaandharaththukku Sameebamaana Idamaagiya Eppiraayeem Ennappatta Oorukkuppoi, Ange Thammudaiya Seesharudanekoodath Thangiyirundhaar.
55 yoodharudaiya Paskaapandigai Sameebamaayirundhadhu, Adharku Munne Anegar Thangalai Suththigariththukkollumporuttu Naattilirundhu Erusalemukkup Ponaargal.
56 ange Avargal Yesuvaith Thedikkondu Dhevaalayaththil Nirkaiyil, Oruvaraiyoruvar Nokki: Ungalukku Eppadith Thondrugiradhu, Avar Pandigaikku Varamaattaaro Endru Pesikkondaargal.
57 pradhaana Aasaariyarum Pariseyarum Avaraip Pidikkumpadi Yosiththu, Avar Irukkira Idaththai Evanaavadhu Arindhirundhaal, Adhai Arivikkavendumendru Kattalaiyittirundhaargal.
